articles.description: A new Xbox sale has arrived, bringing with it more quick completions! This week, we have 20 easy Gamerscore titles offering a plethora of straightforward achievements to unlock.
articles.content:
• Donut County20 Achievements worth 1,310 TA (1,000 GS)
  • Unpacking25 Achievements worth 1,414 TA (1,000 GS)
  • Turnip Boy Commits Tax Evasion37 Achievements worth 1,474 TA (1,000 GS… [+510 chars]
